WELL Health-Safety Rating

You’re well on your way!

It looks like you're not quite meeting the WELL Health-Safety Rating™ requirements just yet, but you may be able to get there.

This report provides some details on the features that we think you already have in the bag, as well as recommendations for additional features to pursue to get you across the finish line. Recommendations are based on your survey responses combined with potential difficulty based on industry standards. Review the report and click the name of each feature to review the detailed requirements.

Features Already Achieved

Total Number of points: 12

The features included in this section are ones you've likely already achieved, based on your survey responses. Review the details of the features linked below to make sure you've got these covered.

expand

Recommended Features to Pursue

Total Number of points: 2

The features in this section should be easily within your reach - combined with any features you've already achieved and those in the next section, these will help get you to the WELL Health-Safety Rating™. Review details below and make sure you'll be able to fulfill the requirements.

expand

Features that May Be More Difficult to Pursue

Total Number of points: 6

The features in this section should be achievable with some effort - combined with any features you've already achieved and those in the green section above, these should help get you to the WELL Health-Safety Rating™. Review details below and check whether you'll be able to fulfill the requirements.

expand

Features that May Be More Difficult to Pursue

Total Number of points: 3

If you meet the detailed requirements for at least 15 features above, you don't need to pursue any further features to earn the WELL Health-Safety Rating™. But if there is any doubt about any of the features above - or if you'd just like to go the extra mile to make your building even healthier - feel free to review details of the features below (although these may be more difficult to achieve).

expand

Features that May Be More Difficult to Pursue

Total Number of points: 2

If you meet the detailed requirements for at least 15 features above, you don't need to pursue any further features to earn the WELL Health-Safety Rating™. But if there is any doubt about any of the features above - or if you'd just like to go the extra mile to make your building even healthier - feel free to review details of the features below (although these may be more difficult to achieve).

expand

*Note on Innovation Features: The 15 Features required for the WELL Health-Safety Rating™ may include up to 3 Innovation Features. This report only shows what we believe to be the 3 most easily achieved Features for your project; however, you may choose to pursue other Features instead, such as an Innovation Proposal or Design for WELL Health-Safety (Option 1 or 3 at https://v2.wellcertified.com/health-safety/en/innovation/feature/1). We may suggest some of these options already, but there are nearly 20 different ways to earn this feature, so you may wish to choose others.
